name: Jump To Die Free Trial
description:
Supported OS:

  • Windows 7 is the only platform we've tested. The game should work on Windows 8 and 10. We are not sure about XP.
  • Linux and Mac may never be supported...but not for sure.

Supported Languages:

  • English
  • 简体中文

"Jump To Die Free Trial" is a free trial version of game "Jump To Die!!". If you like this game and want to buy it, please vote for it on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=784436197


Now you have a chance to operate your own company....of suicide!

This world is doomed. People don't have enough resource to live. As a genius business holder, you realized that it's a chance to make money! So you rent a small building and began your business - to attract people to jump off your roof.

They will pay for that for your nice service. You made them so happy before they finished their lives.

But you won't be making money peacefully....Zombies are around the corner!

  • 18 different types of customers;
  • *Sexy* byebye-girls;
  • A lot of different facilities with different usages;
  • A lot of researches to research;
  • Unlock new content by researching or investment;
  • Make more money, more money and more money;
  • Rank the 1st on every list, like The Most Popular Company or The Richest Company;
  • 20 different waves of zombies;
  • Some annoying opponents;

Oh and, if everything went well, there may be some mysterious visitors...................


Known Issues (试玩版已知的问题):

  • The menu shown when you click facilities has a position issue under different resolutions; 在不同分辨率下，点击设施出现的快捷菜单有个位置的错误；


现在你有机会经营一家你自己的………………跳楼公司！

这个世界已经基本上嗝屁了。大家也没有足够的资源活下去。作为一个商人，你足够天才到发现这是一个商机！所以你租了一栋小小的楼房开始了你的业务——吸引大家从你的楼顶一跃而下。

他们会为此献上自己的钞票，因为你的服务让他们跳楼跳得如此快乐。

但你不会永远安稳地赚着钱……僵尸们就在附近！

  • 18种不同类型的客人；
  • *性感*的拜拜女孩；
  • 一大堆用处各不相同的可建造设施；
  • 一大堆等着你去完成的研究；
  • 通过研究或投资来解锁新要素；
  • 赚钱，赚更多的钱，赚更多更多的钱；
  • 在所有榜单上都排上第一，比如年度最受欢迎公司大奖和福毛斯最富有公司大奖；
  • 20波不同种类的僵尸；
  • 一些令人讨厌的对手；

哦对了，如果一切顺利的话，会有一些神秘的人物来到你的公司……………………
